Package icyllis.arc3d.shaderc

Class ThreadContext

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.shaderc.ThreadContext
public final class ThreadContext extends Object
Thread-safe class that tracks per-thread state associated with Compiler (i.e. Parser or CodeGenerator).

    • convertIdentifier

      @Nullable public Expression convertIdentifier(int position, String name)
      Create expressions with the given identifier name and current symbol table. Report errors via ErrorHandler; return null on error.
